rows.title: Welcome to @global.app_name
rows.message_text:
Keep healthy and feel good after learning more about safe Water, Sanitation and Hygiene (WASH).

@global.app_name is here to support you.

Here is how to use the app:
This big button takes you to the module we encourage you to explore.
Here you can select any of the other modules in @global.app_name. Each module gives you simple tips and information about WASH. Swipe to see the next modules.
You can explore any module whenever you want. To build your knowledge and skills in WASH, access all of the content in one module before moving to the next one.
